name: 2018: An Astro Oddity
description:
2018: An Astro Oddity is a game about an astronaut drifting towards earth. The radio is broken, so you are only receiving radio messages. Earth desperately sends course corrections for you to set at the painfully complicated ship control panel. Will you make it back to earth and find relieve after several years in space? Find out about your destiny and maybe reveal a shocking secret about your journey. Click/Touch control only :)

Technology Notes: 

Code: Phaser JS Art: Marmoset Hexels Sound: Adobe Audition CC
